name: Merchant Thief
description:
You're a merchant, and your pockets are completely empty! No goods, no food, no cash! The local bandits have loads of cash, though. You can snatch it to from them! Better yet, leave the bandits so that they grow in number, and their gold accumulates faster! But don't be careless, or you can see a world full of criminals!

Explore the world and find various enemy camps that hold loads of treasure. Take the gold, and spend it for one night in the inn or buying very nice upgrades. Areas with more bandits yield more gold, so let the bandits spread! Let passerby's get mugged! 

Let there be chaos!

As your gold accumulates, you can upgrade your character to dizzying heights! Get brand new arrows as well, which can improve your fighting skill even further! Keep playing until you accumulate an infinite amount of gold! Each run also has the enemy camps at different locations, so when you finish one run, play another!

Oh, Escape is to Pause btw.

This game runs on a 1600x900 screen. I apologize for those with smaller screens.

Thank you to TinyWorlds and PixelMush for the fonts!
